page.title: 20HIGHAMS PARK-PAST&PRESENT
page.content: THE OLD{REGAL CINEMA}HAS BEEN REFURBISHED AGAIN AND NOW IT IS NOT ONLY A{BINGO HALL}BUT ALSO A{SNOOKER {HALL.}THIS AND THE NEW{MANHATTAN {COCKTAIL BAR}IS SOMEWHERE FOR YOUNG PEOPLE TO GO. 20 YEARS AGO IT WAS VERY QUIET, RATHER LIKE A VILLAGE. THERE HAS BEEN A {COMMUNITY CENTRE}BUILT IN HANDSWORTH AVENUE. ON A LARGE PATCH OF WASTE LAND NEXT TO SPACKMAN HOUSE{OAKHILL SCHOOL WAS BUILT.THE{LEVEL CROSSING}CONSISTED OF 2 LARGE GATES AND HAD A PERSON OPERATING IT; NOW IT IS{AUTOMATIC}WITH {BARRIERS.}THE{TRADNG ESTATE}IN LARKSHALL ROAD HAS BEEN EXPANDED. THERE ARE NOT VERY GOOD SHOPS IN HIGHAMS PARK ANY MORE.{DETERIORATION HAS COME WITH{VANDALISM.}THERE IS MUCH {GRAFFITI}ON WALLS AND SUBWAYS. THE LAKE HAS RUBBISH DUMPED IN IT. THE TRAFFIC AND PARKING IS HORRENDOUS.
